Posts.EditableText: In textadventures.co.uk, could you add an option to edit games? I really want to edit the description of my game and replace the current .cas file to a new, edited one. Thanks
Posts.HTML:
In textadventures.co.uk, could you add an option to edit games? I really want to edit the description of my game and replace the current .cas file to a new, edited one.

Thanks

Posts.EditableText: It's on my list of things to do eventually! In the meantime, if you email me the details, I'll update it for you.
